title: A Policy of Lies
description: LGBT Futuristic Urban Fantasy Suspense Twenty years ago, Levi Kaszeri survived a brutal rebellion on the mining colony of Tarus 9. Now as an aspiring reporter, Levi has a to expose the massacre to the public, and bring the men responsible to justice.But after a violent attack, he is rescued -- then seduced -- by Tiergan Seoras, a young doctor with a dangerous past and a slave tattoo.Soon Levi finds all of his investigations leading him back to Tiergan.
